trans-unit.source: Change mypackage to whatever package or module name is used to import your stuff. The name mysolve should resolve to a callable in your package's namespace which accepts three named arguments year, day, data (any order ok) and returns two values, e.g.:
trans-unit.target: 将 mypackage 更改为用于导入内容的任何软件包或模块名称。名称 mysolve 应该在包的名称空间中解析为可调用的名称，该名称空间可以接受三个命名参数 year ， day ， data （可以任意排序）并返回两个值，例如：

trans-unit.source: How to hook into your code:

Inside the entry-point you can do whatever you need in order to delegate to your code. For example, write out data to a scratch file then run a script, or import a function and just pass in the data directly as an argument. The only requirement is that this entry-point should return a tuple of two values, with the answers for that day's puzzle, the rest is up to you. You could fork this repo and edit it, or just write your own plugin manually.
trans-unit.target: 在入口点里面,你可以做任何你需要的事情,以便委托给你的代码。例如,将数据写入一个scratch文件,然后运行一个脚本,或者导入一个函数,直接将数据作为参数传入。唯一的要求是,这个入口点应该返回一个由两个值组成的元组,并附上当天谜题的答案,其他的由你决定。你可以将这个repo分叉并编辑,或者直接手动编写自己的插件。

trans-unit.source: Provides a working example plugin structure for using the aoc runner script provided by advent-of-code-data.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个工作示例插件结构，以使用advent-of-code-data提供的 aoc 运行器脚本。

trans-unit.source: The aoc runner allows you to easily verify your Advent of Code solutions against multiple datasets, or verify other user's code against your own dataset.
trans-unit.target: 通过 aoc 运行程序，您可以轻松地针对多个数据集验证您的Advent of Code解决方案，或针对自己的数据集验证其他用户的代码。

trans-unit.source: The aoc runner uses setuptools' dynamic discovery of services and plugins feature to locate and run your code. Define your plugin's entry point in setup.py. The group name to use is "adventofcode.user":
trans-unit.target: 在 aoc 亚军用途setuptools的服务和插件的动态发现功能定位和运行代码。在 setup.py 中定义插件的入口点。要使用的组名称是“ adventofcode.user”：
